com.andre601.javabotblockapi

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andre601.javabotblockapi.RequestHandler

  • public class RequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle post-requests to the BotBlock API.

    • Method Detail

      • postGuilds

        public void postGuilds(@NotNull
                       @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.bot.sharding.ShardManager shardManager,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull BotBlockAPI botBlockAPI)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       RatelimitedException
        Posts guilds from the provided ShardManager.
        Parameters:
        shardManager - The ShardManager instance that should be used.
        botBlockAPI - The BotBlockAPI instance that should be used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the post request couldn't be performed properly.
        RatelimitedException - When the Bot (IP or ID) got ratelimited.
        See Also:
        postGuilds(JDA, BotBlockAPI) for posting with JDA.

      • postGuilds

        public void postGuilds(@NotNull
                       @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.core.JDA jda,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull BotBlockAPI botBlockAPI)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       RatelimitedException
        Posts the guilds from the provided JDA.
        If the Bot is sharded (JDA has ShardInfo) then the shard_id and shard_count are posted too.

        If you use this on a sharded bot, better use postGuilds(ShardManager, BotBlockAPI).

        Parameters:
        jda - The JDA instance that should be used.
        botBlockAPI - The BotBlockAPI instance that should be used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the post request couldn't be performed properly.
        RatelimitedException - When the Bot (IP or ID) got ratelimited.
        See Also:
        postGuilds(ShardManager, BotBlockAPI) for posting with ShardManager.

      • postGuilds

        public void postGuilds(java.lang.Long botId,
                       int guilds,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull BotBlockAPI botBlockAPI)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       RatelimitedException
        Posts the provided guilds from the provided Bot id.
        This is a shortcut to postGuilds(String, int, BotBlockAPI).
        Parameters:
        botId - The ID (as long) of the bot.
        guilds - The guilds the bot is in.
        botBlockAPI - The BotBlockAPI instance that should be used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the post request couldn't be performed properly.
        RatelimitedException - When the Bot (IP or ID) got ratelimited.
        See Also:
        postGuilds(String, int, BotBlockAPI) for the full method., postGuilds(ShardManager, BotBlockAPI) for posting with ShardManager., postGuilds(JDA, BotBlockAPI) for posting with JDA.

        guilds - The guilds the bot is in.
        botBlockAPI - The BotBlockAPI instance that should be used.
        Throws:

        RatelimitedException - When the Bot (IP or ID) got ratelimited.
        See Also:

        botBlockAPI - The BotBlockAPI instance that should be used.
